channel.title: Cookies IRC Client
channel.description:
[b]Cookies IRC Client[/b]
Needed to do a mini project so I tried to create a simple irc client with a simple gui. At the moment it supports one server(I fucked everything up and it would take too long to make multiple servers). I should also note that this is not written that efficiently. killerz 99 pkz will optimize 0mg :D
It can:
[ul][li]Accept basic IRC command using "/"[/li] [li]Join chan/Change nick popup boxes[/li] [li]Channels with tabs which can be closed[/li] [li]Tray icon, with notifications when you get highlighted/recieve pm[/li] [li]Chat![/li][/ul]
Bugs:
[ul][li]Nick List is not ordering properly[/li] [li]Client fails miserably when the connection to the server is lost[/li] [li]A lot lot more...[/li][/ul]
Screenies: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=423758.0;attach=17604;image[/img] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=423758.0;attach=17606;image[/img]
Download: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=423758.0;attach=17609]source (whole netbeans project)[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=423758.0;attach=17608]jar[/url]
ps, I did not write the two classes JCloseTabbedPane and JFontChooser. I only modified them.

item.title: Cookies IRC Client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I didn’t mean it would be hard. If FC tried it and it didn’t work, then I believe him. I guess theres no point not trying though…

Read full topic

item.title: Cookies IRC Client
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:327373”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=423761.msg3112062#msg3112062 date=1264628002]

FC, I can fix the ordering, and convert it to web applet if you want.

I used Arrays.sort(teharray) and it didn’t work. You can convert it to web applet if you want; I am not really bothered.
[/quote]
I can DO IT!

@Adam - Gl with that rofl.[/quote]
Not really sure what you mean by that sarcasm but if you’re saying it’d be hard you’ve got to be kidding me. A selection sort is one of the simplest sorts I know.

Read full topic
